title: Watch Configurator
alt: A 3D scene of a luxury watch, next to a customization interface
desc: Several immersive experiences for luxury brands, such as Cartier. A watch configurator has also be adapted to an interactive shop front. (see video demo)

title: xArm-6 Viewer
alt: a smooth white robotic arm with multiple articulation
desc:
This model is part of a controller dashboard for an industrial robotic arm with real-time monitoring.
This team project was lead within the De Vinci Innovation Center.

title: Morse Learner
alt: A desk with a morse key in front of a sunset
desc: This custom project began as a morse interpreter, and became a learning tool in addition to a 3D web experience.

title: Period Tracker
alt: A desk with a morse key in front of a sunset
desc: This minimalist tracker for mobile was made in a 4 days challenge to try out Tailwindcss and PWA

title: CH3SS
alt: 3D chess pieces are aligned, floating in a cosmic environment
desc:
This work in progress is a three dimensional, multiplayer chess game.
This is an ongoing custom project, rules and assets are all original based designs.
